hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="zookeeper" published_version="3.4.11"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
sudo zypper install -y git ant ant-junit cppunit-devel cppunit-devel-doc gcc-c++ make autoconf libtool wget tar # removed patch and net-tools.
rm -rf source_root mkdir source_root cd source_root export SRCRT=`pwd`
export ANT_HOME=/usr/share/ant/ export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib64/jvm/java
#build zookepper cd $SRCRT git clone git://github.com/apache/zookeeper cd $SRCRT/zookeeper git checkout tags/release-3.4.11
ant compile
cd src/c ACLOCAL="aclocal -I /usr/share/aclocal" autoreconf -if ./configure make sudo make install sudo make distclean
cd $SRCRT/zookeeper ant jar ant test | tee test.log
# Add conf file sudo bash -c "cat > conf/zoo.cfg" <<'EOF'
# The number of milliseconds of each tick tickTime=2000 # the directory where the snapshot is stored. # do not use /tmp for storage, /tmp here is just # example sakes. dataDir=/tmp/zookeeper # the port at which the clients will connect clientPort=2181
EOF
sudo bin/zkServer.sh start | tee logfile.log
cat logfile.log | grep STARTED
